## SLOs for Week 04

Students will be able to...

1.  Add conditional logic to queries using `CASE`.
2.  Create and understand the view concept using `CREATE VIEW` and `DROP VIEW`.
3.  Differentiate between materialized and non-materialized views.
4.  Design ER diagrams to model database structures.
5.  Convert ER models into relational schemas.
6.  Create SQL schemas from conceptual designs.
7.  Identify and resolve redundancy issues in schemas.
